thread.title: Spooks question SA’s IS returnees
thread.title_full: Spooks question SA’s IS returnees | News24

author: news24.com
title: Spooks question SA’s IS returnees
text:
As hundreds of weary-looking passengers ambled through the arrivals hall at OR Tambo International Airport on Friday afternoon, a woman was seen sprinting towards her waiting family.
The airport arrivals hall offers its fair share of drama on any day, but on Friday, as 11 South Africans who had travelled to territory held by the Islamic State (IS) in April were reunited with their families, the depth of emotion between the returnees and their waiting families was especially significant.
For many, it was a reunion they had feared would never happen.
“When my sister, Rabia*, left, she said we would meet again in heaven,” said Yusuf Mohammed*.
